title: collision with pycrypto & pycryptodome

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Bug that shouldn't change language semantics when fixed.

body:

### What's your issue about?

```bash
$ vyper examples/crowdfund.vy
Error compiling:  examples/crowdfund.vy
AttributeError: module '_sha3' has no attribute 'sha3'
```
It's problem of import Crypto.Hash rather than `import sha3 as _sha3`.
I fix this problem by this link.
https://github.com/CityOfZion/neo-python/issues/485#issuecomment-403028068
It is collision with pycrypto & pycryptodome. Could you add or check this collision at vyper installation?

### How can it be fixed?

https://github.com/CityOfZion/neo-python/issues/485#issuecomment-403028068
